Hi,

I'm working with Heritrix Engine 3.1.0.
Some of the websites i want to=
 crawl don't have a robots.txt file. 
Considering PreconditionEnforcer rule=
s, those websites are ignored. How can i force heritrix to crawl them ?

In=
 other hand, for websites having a robots.txt file, i also try to ignore ro=
bots rules by adding in the crawler-beans.cxml : 
metadata.robotsPolicyName=
=3DIGNORE
However, the crawl process continues to considering robots.txt ru=
les.

Any help will be appreciated.

Thanks
